skillTree.name: Bull Gore
skillTree.description: Blood everywhere and fatally wounds. There's no walking away from this.

skillTree.name: Frenzy
skillTree.description: Some warriors care not for their own personal safety, and so work themselves into a whirlwind of destruction and mindless violence!

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.name: Grotesque Mutations
skillTree.description: Looking absolutely hideous is a distinct advantage if you actually want others to be afraid of you.

skillTree.name: Living Metal Flesh
skillTree.description: As a Bull Centaur ages, their flesh hardens like metal – harder to hurt, quicker to heal, and better at resisting magical attack.

skillTree.name: Hashut's Scales
skillTree.description: The Father of Darkness protects his children from sorcery through a variety of magical means, all of them twisted and obscure.

skillTree.name: Headdress of Zharr
skillTree.description: Having a thing for hats can be most useful when everyone keeps aiming at your head…

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Temple Guardian
skillTree.description: Who knows whether it's down to a sense of duty or fear of summary execution if he fails, but this one will resolutely guard the Temple of Hashut to the bitter, bloody end.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Stalwart Defender
skillTree.description: None shall pass, at least not while this one breathes.

skillTree.name: Effective Agent
skillTree.description: Learn from the very best if you wish to become better.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Trusted Agent
skillTree.description: The Taur'ruk knows that although this one probably works for his rivals as well, they are without doubt truly loyal to him.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +15% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Murderous Charge
skillTree.description: All in the path of this murderous rampage will have little chance to react before being trampled into a fine red mist.

skillTree.name: Seeing Red
skillTree.description: When that mist descends… Believe me, you don't want to be anywhere near this one, not if you value your worthless life!

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Bully
backgroundSkills.description: In the harsh, cruel world of the Dawi-Zharr, throwing your weight around is definitely the way to get what you want.

backgroundSkills.name: Confrontational
backgroundSkills.description: "There are three ways of doing things around here: the right way, the wrong way, and the way that *I* do it. You understand?"

backgroundSkills.name: Impatient
backgroundSkills.description: Even by Chaos Dwarf standards, this one has a short fuse, and is quick to anger when something – anything – doesn't happen quickly enough.

backgroundSkills.name: Stubborn
backgroundSkills.description: This one won't move, won't roll over, won't give a solitary inch to anyone, ever, over anything.

backgroundSkills.name: Temperamental
backgroundSkills.description: You never quite know where you are with this one. He'd kill you dead just as soon as look at you.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

backgroundSkills.name: Violent
backgroundSkills.description: This one only ever sees red, which is unfortunate for… well, for just about anyone who gets in his way!

backgroundSkills.name: Impulsive
backgroundSkills.description: Some would call them hasty, others dynamic and valiant, for this one acts on impulse, before the enemy have a chance to react.

backgroundSkills.name: Greedy
backgroundSkills.description: Kill them all and keep the loot for yourself. It's not a negative quality to be acquisitive as, after all, it's a material world, no?

backgroundSkills.name: Hated
backgroundSkills.description: No one likes him, but he really couldn't care less. He has an extremely thick skin, figuratively and literally, it seems.

backgroundSkills.name: Hubristic
backgroundSkills.description: Pride is supposed to come before a fall, but thus far, this one has not lived up to that proverb.

backgroundSkills.name: Superior
backgroundSkills.description: This one believes themselves to be better than others in every respect, and acts accordingly at every given opportunity.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: Get in there, get bloody, get the job done – as soon as possible. Dallying's for losers.

backgroundSkills.name: Choleric
backgroundSkills.description: It should be obvious that literally never being in a good mood is going to make one that little bit more brutal in melee.

backgroundSkills.name: Corrupt
backgroundSkills.description: Backhanders – hell, fronthanders, even, so unscrupulous is he.

backgroundSkills.name: Apathetic
backgroundSkills.description: "Do we have to? Urgh, how tedious…"
